title: Manage a Vessel's Waste Log
description: As part of an environmental inspection, an officer must check a vessel's garbage and oil record books for compliance.

tasks.description: Board a vessel to conduct a routine Port State Control inspection.
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer boards the vessel for an inspection.

tasks.description: Request to see the vessel's Oil Record Book and Garbage Record Book.
tasks.expected_outcome: The vessel's Chief Officer provides the logbooks.

tasks.description: Review the books to ensure all waste disposal has been logged correctly and receipts from shore facilities are present.
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer checks the logs and finds them to be in full compliance with MARPOL regulations.
